title: what counts as a loss acording to op.gg?
body:
347W 348L  in op.gg page

347W 338L in load screen

what does it count as a loss lol..... remakes? just curious

replies.body:
Probably remakes and/or leaves/DCs. Perhaps even loss prevented.

I can't think of anything else that might cause that.

op.gg sometimes misses some games, especially if there was a problem with the api, and you weren't a popular enough player for anyone to request an update for your op.gg page, sometimes entire days of games will go missing. Your client would have the accurate number
